ALPHA_USER.title: Alpha User
ALPHA_USER.description: Participated in the Journaly Alpha test. We've come a long way since then, but this user was on the front lines helping catch early bugs and shape Journally since the beginning!

BETA_USER.title: Beta User
BETA_USER.description: Participated in the Journaly Beta test. The hero Journaly needs.

CODE_CONTRIBUTOR.title: Code Contributor
CODE_CONTRIBUTOR.description: Has contributed code to the Journaly codebase. You can find the Journaly source code, and contribute yourself, at https://github.com/Journaly/journaly

NECROMANCER.title: Necromancer
NECROMANCER.description: Gave new feedback on a post that's over a week old.

ODRADEK.title: Odradek
ODRADEK.description: Did something that has no apparent function.
